b. Early detection of pregnancy
Early diagnosis of pregnancy is necessary to ensure adequate care to pregnant mother, foetal growth and 
development and safe delivery. It should be undertaken as early as possible after the first missed period. ASHAs 
have a list of eligible couples for their population and undertake household visits to facilitate earl
